bibl.title: A List of Words of Christian Origin from the Kelsey Museum.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: Part of a group of nearly 300 ostraka (mostly Coptic), purchased in Cairo by Carl Schmidt in 1936-1937. School exercise. Thebes (?), IV AD.
bibl.seg: 142.4 O. Ann Arbor Kelsey Mus. Inv. 25152 = O. Bagnall 10
Raffaella Cribiore, A List of Words of Christian Origin from the Kelsey Museum.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 61-66, 1 fig.
Part of a group of nearly 300 ostraka (mostly Coptic), purchased in Cairo by Carl Schmidt in 1936-1937. School exercise. Thebes (?), IV AD.
